pages.text: Thelodus is a flat jawless fish from the Silurian period. Thelodus is known mainly from scales and impressions in rocks. It could have been up to a meter in length and they probably fed by sucking in prey with their mouths.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
